text: Amom is a Meitei family. It is native to Ancient Kangleipak (Antique Manipur). People of this family mainly live in Manipur, India. == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/similar- surname.aspx?surname=Amom * http://www.indiachildnames.com/mobile/similarfamilyname.aspx?surname=Amom Category:Meitei surnames
title: Amom
